body.p: For the purpose of this example, the fair value of Entity C’s liability is calculated using a present value technique . Entity C concludes that a market participant would use all the following inputs (consistently with paragraphs B12–B30 of the IFRS) when estimating the price the market participant would expect to receive to assume Entity C’s obligation:

li.p: the terms of the debt instrument, including all the following:
principal amount of CU2 million; and
the market rate of interest of 10.5 per cent (which includes a change of 50 basis points in the risk of non‑performance from the date of issue).
